devdoc.details: Proposer-Executor RelationshipTransactions can be executed after the `delay` has passed

setRegistry(address).details: Requires sender to be Governance of the new Registry to avoid bricking.Ideally should not be used

devdoc.title: Oh! Finance Governor

MAXIMUM_DELAY().notice: Maximum time period transactions can be queued for

MINIMUM_DELAY().notice: Minimum time period transactions must be queued for

delay().notice: Time delay before queued transactions can be executed

queuedTransactions(bytes32).notice: Transaction Queue of all successfull proposal actions

setRegistry(address).notice: Set the Registry for the contract. Only callable by Governance.

userdoc.notice: Executor Contract that queues up and executes on-chain transactions to modify the protocolQueued actions must come from a successful proposal
